title: Liquor Compliance Penalties: April-Sept
name: Liquor Compliance Penalties: April-Sept
description:
A Map by Vancouverpapers

From April 1 to September 30, 2007, the BC  Liquor Control and Licensing Branch performed 4,604 inspections of bars, restaurants and private liquor stores.
They found 445 contraventions (after-hours consumption, overcrowding, minors on premises, restaurant operating as a bar, intoxication) and issued 57 penalties.

properties.name: 100 Mile House - Royal Canadian Legion
properties.description: Posted by VancouverpapersPermitting intoxicated person to remain (4 day licence suspension) Contravening a term and condition – selling liquor, hours of sale (1 day licence suspension)
